document.topic_text: 11.08.2016 - 10:27 | Source: Djurgarden IF Isaksson joins Djurgarden Allsvenskan Former Manchester City goalkeeper Andreas Isaksson has left Turkish side Kasimpasa to sign for Djurgarden IF . The Sweden international has put pen to paper on a contract with the Swedish outfit which will run until summer 2018. Isaksson made 20 games for the Citizens.
